name: the Last Dream of your First Love
name_original: the Last Dream of your First Love
description:
You met them again, after such a long time. Somehow, you still adored them, still would steal out all of the stars in the sky for them.

But it had been too long, there was too much to say. What could you possibly say?

---------------------------------------------------------------------

A short contemplative bitsy game about a relationship. Use the arrow keys and do your best to make them happy- or, maybe it's time to start thinking about how to say goodbye? But how can you leave someone who still haunts your dreams?
